agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the operational processes of the Commonwealth Interoperability Coordinator, such as those related to general administration, conferences, awards, budgeting, interns, publications and strategic plans. This may include, but is not limited to: incoming and outgoing correspondence, memoranda, reports, databases and supporting material.

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the re-grant of federal funds for improvements to interoperability between local and state agencies in Virginia. Programs include Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS), State Homeland Security Grant Program, and other state and federal interoperability funding streams. Information gathered is used to adjudicate grant applications. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, emails, supporting materials, evaluation criteria.

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the activities of and the initiatives undertaken by the Office of Interoperability, such as those related to interoperability communications, information technology, telecommunications and other areas where common language and best practices are sought. Select information from this series is used to develop the Annual Interoperability Communications Plan, submitted to the Assembly. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, memoranda, and reports.

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the Secretariatâ€™s interactions, including emergency declarations, interstate lane reversals, and terrorism, with the Department of Emergency Services and the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA). This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, notes, and reports.

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the assessment of and recommendations for improvements to agency disaster recovery and contingency plans. This series may include, but not limited to: plans, reports, correspondence, and notes. 5200.01-V3
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents terrorism-related communications with the Office of Homeland Security, other federal offices, and law enforcement entities that may contain lawsensitive and/or classified information. This series may but is not limited to: confidential terrorism threat alerts, bulletins, and reports.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

agency_name: Secretary of Public Safety and Homeland Security
series_description: This series documents the meeting activities and work product of the Secure Commonwealth Panel, including meetings with various outside groups and commissions. This series may include, but is not limited to: agendas, meeting summaries, recordings of panel and sub-panel meetings.
